{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Calix |model=GS2026 |revision=E |series=AX6000 |fcc_date=07/24/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, IoT hub |fcc_id=2ABLK-GS2026 |ic_id=4009A-GS2026 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8074 |cpu1_cspeed=2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F64G08AKCCBH2-10:C |fla2=0.5 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L4006E |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107:P |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=QCN5054 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=QCN5054 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=8 |wi1_rxchains=8 |wi1_sstreams=8 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=QCN5024 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85333-11;85333-11, 63369E1A, 1742 MX;4;,,, 5GHz High-Power WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85747-11;85747-1, 077ES6, 1751 MX;4;,,, Power Management IC;Qualcomm;PMP8074;Q, PMP8074, 000-01, PE745VRC;1;,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 751HR7;1;,,, Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking Wireless SoCs for Zigbee and Thread;Silicon Labs;EFR32MG;EFR32, MG12P432JG, 1815C00O9P;1;,,, Z-Wave SoC/Transciever;Sigma Designs;ZM5101;ZM5101A-CME3, A201431.1, 1725 TWN;1;,,, Microphone Array ASR-Assist Audio Processor;Microsemi;ZL38063;ZL38063, B A (e3), 1739MAA;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1, Zigbee, Z-Wave, VHT80+80, HE80+80, 3.5mm audio output, |stock_os=Linux;4.4.60;;, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_ssid=CXNKXXXXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin }}
:• '''1150''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) :• '''4800''' Mbps - 8SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (80MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
The maximum transfer rate for 802.11ax is listed as 4803.9Mbps in test report documents despite claims within the same documents that 80+80MHz channel bandwidths are supported with 8TX and 8RX chains. We'll go with the 4800 Mbps speed, for now, on the assumption that this device drops down to 4x4:4 when using 80+80MHz channels since other 802.11ax devices currently seem to do so. "NQ399" Micron [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9PTK FBGA code] on the flash corresponds to the MT29F64G08AKCCBH2-10:C "D9SHD" Micron [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9PTK FBGA code] on the RAM corresponds to the MT41K256M16TW-107:P {{WiFiCert|WFA77812|07/30/2018}} ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]]
